chart_description: The Ping round-trip time standard deviation chart shows the variation in the time it takes for packets to go from the local machine to a remote host and back. A high standard deviation indicates that packets are taking different paths and experiencing different levels of latency, which can impact network performance.

dimension_descriptions.std_dev: The standard deviation dimension shows the statistical measure of the amount of variation or dispersion in the ping round-trip time. A high standard deviation value indicates that the ping times vary greatly, while a low value indicates that the ping times are relatively consistent.
